heading: Content Block 1
summary: Share the dopomoha.ro content where it is most neededDownload the poster here, print it and display it in crowded places that are visible to people - storefronts, apartment buildings, etc.

heading: Content Block 2
summary: Download the flyer from here, it contains the general information fromDOPOMOHA.RO. You can share them wherever you go, in stores, means of transport, parks etc.

heading: Content Block 3
summary: See the guide with common expressions in Romanian, translated into English and Ukrainian.Click here for the phrase book

heading: Content Block 4
summary: Sprijin de UrgențăDo you need any resources, food, products, clothing, tents, transportation or volunteers or do you want to offer any of the above on Sprijin de Urgență?Request or provide resources

heading: Content Block 5
summary: Un AcoperișDo you need support in finding temporary accommodation or do you want to provide a space to help vulnerable people who are now coming to Romania. Access Un Acoperiș!Search or offer accommodation
